name: Tamashii (itch) (kroltan)
description:
Tamashii is a fighting game based on stances and counters, made for LD44, but not finished in time sadly.

Controls

You select your stance by moving to the upper or lower halves of the screen.

  • Left click performs an attack on the current stance.
  • Right click blocks an incoming attack if on the same stance.
  • If you block quickly, you will perform a counter-attack that deals extra damage.
Credits
  • Leonardo Giovanni Scur: Programming
  • Gabriel Rossito Mesquita: Game Design
  • Lucas Silva: 3D Art and Textures

This game also uses assets provided by third parties for free, including the interface elements and the base model for the temple, which were only modified during the jam.
